      int[][] definition()

      Check if the Boulders/Dimaonds can fall, if the player is under the boulder or diamond, if the boulder can be pushed and reload the Level if the player dies.

        public int[][] definition()

        public void fall()
        Check if the Boulders/Dimaonds can fall, if the player is under the boulder or diamond, if the boulder can be pushed and reload the Level if the player dies.
